title: #449: Is Woody Allen Innocent with Rick Worley
description:
Thank you so much for tuning in for another dangerous episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. TFH has all the dangerous conversations and this one is a doozy. This episode we welcome independent researcher Rick Worley to the show to discuss his deep dives into the Woody Allen/Mia Farrow case and what Allen v Farrow didn't tell you. This episode is going to piss some of you off but hey this is what you come to TFH for right? Thank you for your support.
